text: The Drinking Den () is a 1909 French silent drama movie directed by Albert CapellaniKate Griffiths. Emile Zola and the Artistry of AdaptationL'ASSOMMOIR and stars Alexandre Arquillière, Jacques Grétillat, and Eugénie Nau. ==Actors== * Alexandre Arquillière as Coupeau * Jacques Grétillat as Lantier * Eugénie Nau as Gervaise * Catherine Fonteney as Virginie * Jacques Varennes ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:French movies Category:1909 movies Category:French drama movies Category:French silent movies
title: The Drinking Den
